# Reactive Perception (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/2 levels

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

As you cast this spell, the perception of events around you seem both faster and more clear.

You suddenly perceives events happening immediately around him in such as way as to be able to react more quickly. The target uses its Cha or Int (Cha for sorcerers and Int for assassins and wizards) modifier to determine the number of attacks of opportunities it may make.
